value.stringValue: $Label.Approval_Level + " " + IF( AND( ([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_Approval_Level__c > 0) ,([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_MAX_PPT_Level__c > 0) ), TEXT([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_Approval_Level__c ) + " and PPT Level " + TEXT([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_MAX_PPT_Level__c) , IF( ([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_Approval_Level__c > 0) ,TEXT([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_Approval_Level__c ) ,TEXT([csmso__Sales_Order__c].Print_Display_MAX_PPT_Level__c) + " PPT Level " ) ) + " Approver"
